alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rooks County through 730 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Zurich, or 13 miles northeast of Ellis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville and Zurich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
